command: [withheld — non-actionable: would use IPv6 UDP with a specified traffic class (if available) to send base64-encoded chunks to a unicast destination on a high, uncommon port]
explanation: IPv6-specific options and addressing provide a distinct medium from typical IPv4/HTTPS traffic, aligning with T1011.
rationale_steps: Leverage IPv6 unicast to avoid primary IPv4 channels
Optionally set IPv6 traffic class without altering routing
Chunk and send via UDP to a high-numbered port
Avoids any persistent network configuration changes
